divs: sighting detailstime was closer to midnight sat\sun am; as i drove home (night watchman\security) i noticed a giant birdlike ufo. object was weird, and glided over the area at tree-top level w\out a sound. the craft travlled about 15mph tops. no known reason to appear. as it flew over a nieghbr's house - it occured the object may have an appendage - but the center was such that it's center was 6ft and it's distance above a cattle farm. eventually lost sight of the craft after 30 secs or so. this is thired ufo sighting since childhood. felt excited during the vision. also, i'm a paranormal group investigator.
